Hey All! 
Is this a known problem: what %% of stake an adversary validator should have to build an alternative chain with finality by evicting other validators due to inactivity penalty? 

I.e. the validator (with N deposits) generates only own blocks and attestations and waits until all other deposits are drained due to inactivity penalty and this validator becomes 100% staker.
